scripts.bootstrap: npm run cli-utils:setup && npm run cli-plugin-ionic-angular:setup && lerna bootstrap && npm run build && lerna run build-ts
scripts.cli-utils:setup: cd packages/cli-utils && npm install && npm run build-ts
scripts.publish:canary: lerna run build && lerna publish --canary --exact --npm-tag canary
scripts.publish:beta: lerna run build && lerna publish --exact --npm-tag beta
scripts.publish:rc: lerna run build && lerna publish --exact --npm-tag beta
scripts.publish:ci: lerna run build && npm run publish:canary -- --yes
